channel.title: Signatures
channel.description:
1st Signature that i made from photshop. I used Mr. Chris Signature tutorial, somehow i found the wolverine picture on google images(lmao) on page 20 something, took a while. Thanks to Mr. Chris again for the tutorial. Please rate all.
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img139.imageshack.us/img139/8681/sigms0.gif[/img][/URL]
2nd Signature. Kind of crappy, i was bored and i was playing some halo when i was making it :eek:. Took it out, took up to much room.
http://img145.imageshack.us/img145/7163/untitled1rn6.gif
3rd Signature. Im happy i did it all by myself. :cool:.
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/4039/untitled2dt0.gif[/img][/URL]
4th Signature. Halo. :rolleyes:. Time to watch a different signature tutorial. :D.
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img224.imageshack.us/img224/6526/halosignature3ls1.gif[/img][/URL]
5th Signature. This one is my favorite tell me what you think. Spent 2 hours or so on this one. Getting it perfect.
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img86.imageshack.us/img86/5543/perfectdarkzerosignatureoj5.gif[/img][/URL]
6th Signature. This is the one i meant fade away with.
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img237.imageshack.us/img237/1494/inuyashasignaturezx6.gif[/img][/URL]
7th Signature. I finally got new renders and brushes thanks to mr. chris. No more google image searching. :D.
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/7444/zeldasignaturetf5.gif[/img][/URL]

item.title: Signatures
item.dc:creator: @WhiteShadow WhiteShadow
item.description:
@WhiteShadow wrote:

Keaten:

Thanks. If anyone can help me really fast, how can i make images fade away ?

I’m not sure what you meant, but you can make a render fade by using feathering. Take the magic wand and click on your render, then do right click select inverse > feather > press delete a couple of times until you like it.

I don’t really like some of them because of the darkness. But great for a beginer! I like the last one’s back ground alot, good mix of colors.

Read full topic

item.title: Signatures
item.dc:creator: @Keaten Keaten
item.description:
@Keaten wrote:

Okay thanks ill try it.

Read full topic

item.title: Signatures
item.dc:creator: @googlethis googlethis
item.description:
@googlethis wrote:

use the diffuse setting or adjust the opacity, depending on what you mean by “fade away”. if you need help beyond that, just pm me.

Read full topic
